23-034EC.summary: Recommendation to discuss the progress report from the Ad Hoc Committee on the Lobbyist Ordinance recommendation.Commissioner Shotwell joined the meeting.Chair Morales spoke.Vice Chair Pollack spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Morales spoke.April Walker, Administrative Deputy City Manager, spoke.Commissioner Fiedler spoke.Commissioner Wise spoke.Commissioner De Benedictis spoke.Leanna Noble spoke.Page 2 of 10411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 3:00 PMWEDNESDAY, MAY 10, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESKaren Reside spoke.Van Bui spoke.Nubia Flores spoke.Romeo Hebron spoke.Michelle Byerly spoke.Hollis Stewart spoke.Joselle spoke.Parisa Vinzant spoke.Catherine Miles spoke.Marlene Montañez spoke.Ariana Kennedy spoke.Christina Kreachbaum spoke.James Suazo spoke.Zamaria spoke.Caitlin Bellis spoke.Jamilet spoke.Erik spoke.Mayra Fernanda spoke.Unidentified person spoke.Gray Mankey spoke.Gregory Johnson spoke.Page 3 of 10411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 3:00 PMWEDNESDAY, MAY 10, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESCarla spoke.Joanna Diaz spoke.Mary Duong spoke.Christina Hall spoke.Violet Brown spoke.Jayson Mercado spoke.Andre Donado spoke.Commissioner Wise spoke.Taylor Anderson, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Chair Morales spoke.Commissioner Fiedler spoke.Taylor Anderson, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Fiedler and Taylor Anderson, Deputy City Attorney.Commissioner Shotwell spoke.Commissioner Fiedler spoke.Commissioner Wise spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Fiedler and Commissioner Wise.Chair Morales spoke; and made a motion.Commissioner Shotwell spoke.April Walker, Administrative Deputy City Manager, spoke.Page 4 of 10411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 3:00 PMWEDNESDAY, MAY 10, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESChair Morales spoke.A dialogue ensued among Chair Morales, Commissioner Shotwell, and April Walker, Administrative Deputy City Manager.A motion was made by Chair Morales, seconded by Commissioner De Benedictis, to approve recommendation, as amended, to [1] receive and file the report of the Ad Hoc Committee on the Lobbyist Ordinance; [2] direct the Chair and the Vice Chair to work with staff on the development of a community meeting process with one or more meetings; [3] designate the Ad Hoc Committee on the Lobbyist Ordinance members, Commissioner Wise, Vice Chair Pollack, and Chair Morales attend the community meetings with staff; [4] request each member of the Commission submit questions they want to present to the community for contemplation in advance of those meetings within the next 10 days; and [5] request City staff to conduct an equity analysis, if possible in advance of the community meeting, and determine if the analysis should be referred to the Equity and Human Relations Commission.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Lani De Benedictis, Luke Fiedler, J. P. Shotwell, Susan Wise, Barbara Pollack and Margo MoralesAbsent: 1 - Raúl Añorve4.

OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 3:00 PMWEDNESDAY, MAY 10, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESA dialogue ensued among Chair Morales, Commissioner Wise, and April Walker, Administrative Deputy City Manager.Commissioner Wise spoke; and made a motion.Taylor Anderson, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Wise and Taylor Anderson, Deputy City Attorney.April Walker, Administrative Deputy City Manager, spoke.Chair Morales spoke.Parisa Vinzant spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Wise, seconded by Commissioner De Benedictis, to approve recommendation, as amended, that the item be continued to the Ethics Commission meeting of Wednesday, June 13, 2023 and request staff to come back with a report on the public records requests that includes data on turnover time, requests that have been there for more than 24 days, what steps have been taken to reduce the outstanding public records request, and recommendations from staff on how the Commission can positively impact the improvement of turnaround time for public record requests.
